message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below what the product is worth to me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a reasonable price. How about $11,000? This would be a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
